channel.title: Surrogate analysis on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in Surrogate analysis on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Day 2 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Scaling exponents as quantifiers of proficiency, health & well-being (fractal physiology) Correlation functions (Multi-) fractal fluctuation analyses Early warning signals of phase transitions Tentative time table for Day 2 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Detecting (nonlinear) structure in time series FH Ergodicity, PACF, Fractal Dimension, Relative Roughness, Sample Entropy 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.

item.title: Day 4 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Cross-RQA Quantifying synchronisation and coupling strength Analysis of leader-follower behavior and coupling direction Introduction to recurrence networks Tentative time table for Day 2 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Quantifying interaction dynamics of coupled systems FH Cross-RQA 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.00-12.00 Assignments Cross-RQA, Diagonal recurrence profiles, Surrogate analysis 12.
